title: Bug 14943: Code Assist does not respect platform line ends
description: The Code Assist feature is not behaving as expected regarding platform line ends.
OB: When using Code Assist, the line ends are not being respected according to the platform.
EB: The expected behavior is that Code Assist should respect platform line ends, and they should be consistent with CR/LF standards.
SR:
1. Open the Code Assist feature.
2. Create a new file with different line endings (CRLF or LF) based on your platform.
3. Observe that Code Assist does not respect the line endings as expected.
